Name: Human
Desc: A creation of Gran Kain, Humans have well-balanced stats and adapt quickly to any class. Humans worship Einhasad, the goddess of light.

Name: Elf
Desc: Einhasad formed the Elves from water, making them agile and light on their feet. They are protected by the goddess of water, Eva.

Name: Dark Elf
Desc: Dark Elves specialize in dark magic. They used to worship the goddess Shilen until their raceâ€™s downfall led them to deny their faith.

Name: Dwarf
Desc: Einhasad created the Dwarves from the land. They are handy and physically powerful. They worship Maphr, the goddess of land.
